mapper.select: select ri.room_no,ru.user_id From room_info ri left join room_users ru on ri.room_no = ru.room_no where ri.status = 0 and ru.is_video_muted = 1
select ri.room_no,ru.user_id From room_info ri left join room_users ru on ri.room_no = ru.room_no where ri.status = 0 and ru.on_seat != -1 and ru.is_self_muted = 0
